column5: hello all spent the last two days fishing with my father on doe lake the frist morning was great we started out at 6:30am from the time we hit the water till the time we left the fish never stop bitting we got a lot of pike&bass the eyes where not happen till the next day we managed to land 4 eyes in all but that does'n matter it's the time spent with my father that counts i can only post two pictures do to the fact that i droped my wifes camera in the water  this was my first pike  then my bass  rob
Sounds like you had a great couple of days Rob, except for the dropping of the camera  Maureen
LOL I can hear her still chewing yer ear off for that.  Know those spots and real nice fish bro.  Must of been the hat.LOL

Nice fish none-the-less.  I keep threatening to drop my wife's digi Camera in the water ... only to force us to get a better one.    The time spent fishing with your Dad is the best of all .... keep doing it.
Great report!  Must be awesome fishing with your dad.  Sorry to hear about the camera!!!
Glad ya's had a good time...
Thanks for sharing with us, your day with your Dad
tie the camera around your neck next time lol
Nice report fished Doe earlier this year the pike were fun!
sounds like you had a great time fishing with your dad. you can always buy another camera, memories fishing with your dad are priceless.
